content: this crochet jellyfish pattern is a great beginner amigurumi project it s made all in one piece so there s no seaming anything together and it s made up of super simple stitches and shapes i loved making this crochet jellyfish and i hope you do too this pattern works up really fast and because it s all in one piece you don t need to worry about seaming or having extra tools the pdf includes the following *sizing about 3 5 inches tall plus tentacles as long or short as you want *gauge *skills used a short list of the techniques that go into this pattern *materials what i used and recommend *full pattern *step-by-step pictures i took pictures of each step to guide you through the pattern because of the nature of this product i m sorry to say i can t accept refunds or exchanges copyright feel free to sell items made using these patterns with a link back to the original pattern you may not redistribute copy or pass this pattern as your own if you want to share it send them back here to get their own copy
